title: A Well known stranger
creator_credit: Canadian Broadcasting Corporation and Vincent Tovell
brief_description: The human brain and attempts to understand its function. Covers a wide range of investigations, showing study of structure and physiology, electrical phenomena, localisation, animal and human learning experiments, sensation and sleep.
